item.description:
Not the greatest format, but here's the details!! :) ~~~~~~~~~~
Rock-n-Dock Festival
Foxboro, MA
05/04/2012 - 05/06/2012
Hosted by: DockDogs WorldWide | DockDogs Nationals

Event Details:
Event Format
Outdoor Big Air®, Extreme Vertical™ & Speed Retrieve™

Online Pre-Registration Closes
May 1, 2012 11:45 pm EST (pre-registration is limited)

Pre-Registration Entry Fees
$25.00 / team per Big Air, Speed Retrieve Wave, or Extreme Vertical Competition (Pre-Reg Limited to 30 dogs per Big Air, 30 dogs for Speed Retrieve Waves, 15 dogs for Extreme Vertical, $25.00 per team for Iron Dog Rankings

On-Site Registration Entry Fees
$30.00 / team per Big Air, Speed Retrieve Wave, or Extreme Vertical Competition (Limited to a total of 40 dogs per Big Air, 40 dogs for Speed Retrieve Waves, 28 dogs for Extreme Vertical), $30.00 per team for Iron Dog Rankings

Event Schedule
Friday May 4, 2012 •Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:30am
•Big Air Wave #1 - 9:30 am
•Big Air Wave #2 - 11:30 am
•Big Air Wave #3 - 1:30 pm
•Big Air Wave #4 - 3:30 pm
•Big Air Wave #5 - 5:30 pm
Saturday May 5, 2012 •Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:30am
•Big Air Wave #6 - 9:30 am
•Big Air Wave #7 - 11:30 am
•Extreme Vertical - 2:00 pm
Sunday May 6, 2012 •Onsite Registration / Practice - 8:30am
•Speed Retrieve - 9:30 am
•Big Air Wave #8 - 11:30 am
•Big Air Wave #9 - 1:30 pm
•Speed Retrieve Finals - 3:30pm
•Big Air Finals (Pro, Semi-Pro, & Amateur)

Bass Pro Shops 1 Bass Pro Drive Foxboro, MA
Event Location:
Foxboro, MA
item.name: Last Minute! Dock Dogs Competition in Foxboro!
